entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets in the morning. Light snow beginning near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
